name: Global Financial Crisis
description: Severe economic downturn following the collapse of Lehman Brothers

name: Dot-com Bubble
description: Collapse of technology stocks following excessive speculation

name: COVID-19 Crash
description: Rapid market decline due to the COVID-19 pandemic

name: 2013 Taper Tantrum
description: Market reaction to Fed announcement of QE tapering

name: 2022 Rate Hikes
